/usr/local/cuda-11.8/bin/nvcc -forward-unknown-to-host-compiler  -arch=native -Xcompiler=-fPIC -Wno-deprecated-gpu-targets -shared -dlink CMakeFiles/NMR_exe.dir/src/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/NMR_exe.dir/src/NmrRelaxationSolve.cpp.o CMakeFiles/NMR_exe.dir/src/NmrRelaxationSolveKernels.cu.o -o CMakeFiles/NMR_exe.dir/cmake_device_link.o   -L/usr/local/cuda-11.8/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/stubs  -L/usr/local/cuda-11.8/targets/x86_64-linux/lib   -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread -ldl
